block_content: Blocked users won’t find you, your profile, postings, timelines, and anything related to you. OhoWorks does not inform that you have blocked them.
block_user_des: Blocked users won’t find you, your profile, postings, timelines, and anything related to you. OhoWorks does not inform that you have blocked them.
blocked_user_des: Following users are blocked by you. They will not be able to see you in their search results as well as any content posted by you will not be visible to them.

campus_room_des: When you create Work rooms, all members of your company will be able to join the room. It's visible in the search results of these members. You can invite only staff who are part of the company

mentor_note: A mentor is a person with more experience, knowledge who can pass along what they have experienced & learned to a more people on certain topics. Having a strong mentor at your work and taking frequent advice is a good way to set yourself up for significant career transitions. It’s critical to work productively with them to achieve a set of goals.

news_agree_1: I understand that I can not violate any of the copyrights. I assure OhoWorks, that I have either not copied any news or mentioned the link of the News article from where the gist of the news was taken. I understand in case if the news is Considered or reported as copyright violation, OhoWorks will take down the news.
news_agree_2: I understand that I cannot post any news which Is factually incorrect

poll_ins1: A poll can run for up to 15 days only.
poll_ins2: We do not allow polls on, political, obscene, individuals, or any sensitive topics. We shall block such polls.
primary_role: Select the primary role that you are responsible at
private_room_des: When the room is private, only those who are invited could join the room. The room is not visible in search results. You can invite anyone from OhoWorks users. While inviting users to join, the list shows only the followers & following, however you can search for any user who you know in OhoWorks.

program_quote_teacher: Select the right financial year above, before selecting programs that you are coaching
public_room_des: When the room is public, the room is available for any user of OhoWorks to join and is available over search results. You can invite anyone among OhoWorks users. While inviting users to join, the list shows only the followers & following, however you can search for any user who you know in OhoWorks
reg_step1_des: Fill the form with the details of the staff who will register and administer your company.
reg_step2_des: Login through web https://www.oho.works and click on Manage company.
regis_requirement:
1. You will be made, as the first admin of your company. 
2. You can assign other admins later.
3. Please ensure that your company is not registered with OhoWorks already.
4. Since similar names are possible in many companies, name-based duplicity validation is not done by OhoWorks.
5. A new company can be registered only by an authorised staff.
6. You could earn up to 1000Rs to get your company registered.
7. Registering an company may take little a longer time than a user registration.
8.You need to be a staff with an company or government-issued ID Card.
9. If your company is already registered and your registration is found to be duplicitous, OhoWorks does not validate your registration.
register_desc: You can either join an existing company or create a new business. If you create a new company, you shall be the admin for your company
register_message: You are a few more steps away to be part of the best Social Learning Network
remove_admin_message: Are you sure you want to remove $name as an admin
remove_content: When you remove users from your followers' list they won’t be getting regular updates from you. They still can follow you back. OhoWorks does Not inform that you have removed them. But you will not be on the users Following list.
remove_member: Are you sure, you want to remove $name from this room?
remove_user_des: When you remove users from your followers' list they Won’t be getting regular updates From you. They still can follow you back. OhoWorks does Not inform that you have removed them. But you will not be on the users' following list.
report_abuse_des: As per our policy, we shall look into your report, and may share the content with the concerned company. However, we may not take an action, in the event the content is not in violation as reported by you. We do not respond to abuse reports.
report_disturb: $name has reported $name2 to be disruptive speaker.
request_speakers: $name has requested you to be one of the speakers!

 In case if the company does not have its own Email domain, we shall validate the staff, through our internal process before the staff can manage

teacher_inst:
1. In case you did not receive a code from your company, you may continue with setup by clicking on “Do not have a code?” 
 
  2. However, your profile will be activated only after it is approved by the company. 
 
 3. You may send a WhatsApp reminder to your company at the end of the setup.

teacher_intro_subtitle: Teams are the source of enormous knowledge

test_subtitle: Select subjects that you are interested, coaching
thank_u_filling_details: Thank you for filling the details. We will get back to you soon.
tips_to_answer:
Tips to get good answers.
1. OhoWorks is meant your professional life & career, don’t ask irrelevant questions
2. Avoid asking questions that are already asked
3. Keep your questions short and simple.
4. Check for spelling & grammar mistakes.
5. Use #tags to refer topics & interests
6. Use @ to tag users
7. Use [] to tag rooms
topic_des: Please select your topic type,if your lesson id meant for company purpose select company else select other business
topic_detail_dec: Topic is like a title of a book. For example, Calculus for office 10 or Higher engineering mathematics.You can add more chapter under one topic later,You can skip if don't want more chapter on same topic
tutor_note: A tutor & coach is a private staff who teaches on various subjects, activities and sports. In addition to company learning, having a private tutor helps to learn in different perspectives.
unfollow_content: When you un-follow you will not get regular updates from the user. However, some of the contents may be visible to you on your feed page OhoWorks does not inform that, you have unfollowed them. But you will not be on the users' follower list.
unfollow_user_des: When you un-follow you will not get regular updates for the user. However, some of the contents may be visible to you on your feed page OhoWorks does not inform the user that you have unfollowed them. But you will not be on the users' Follower list.
upcoming_talks_des: See who are going to talk
update_profile_text: We serve to verifiable users. We want to ensure there isn’t any wrong users in our platform. Please help us providing your details.
upi_des: Once the invitation details are verified at our end, Rs. 1,000 is transferred to your bank through UPI transfer only.
upload_details: Upload the invitation details of staff.'
upload_image_content2: Being a network for educational purposes, your profile picture is necessary to ensure there is no misuse of the network. Please add your profile picture.
upload_photo_id: To validate your company, you need to upload your company ID or any government-issued ID.
upload_ur_photo:
Please upload only an image of yourself that clearly shows your face. Some of our users are children. For safety purposes, we do not accept any other image.

In case an image taken out of the internet is uploaded, your account will be blocked and you could be prosecuted under respective laws.
